title: Ryze Tattoo Art?
body:
Hey,

I want to get another tattoo something that symbolizes Ryze but not a tattoo of the champion ryze. Like an emblem. I can't find anything decent so if anyone has any ideas or can find some good tattoo idea would appreciate it.

Thanks :P

replies.body:
There is the symbol he creates from magic with his taunt:
https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3XEwMZG703k/V3LogIODtbI/AAAAAAAAQ-c/lkZt-VJDgi8I6OO7cxQqj7Hdh23S_UexgCLcB/s1600/ryze0taunt.jpg

But what i think would be better, would be a ring around the arm made from the runes that make up his Q, some of which can be seen on the left under the scroll here:
http://cdn.garenanow.com/webupdate/live/lolphweb/news/2015%20June/29/Ryze/590.JPG
and in-game here:
https://cdn3.vox-cdn.com/thumbor/VBuVqNpcA_1Mp0LtwnWUEDMFNmQ=/cdn0.vox-cdn.com/uploads/chorus_asset/file/6720919/image.jpg
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/9nmNqWQonBI/maxresdefault.jpg

By arm ring tattoo i mean this kind of thing:
http://www.oocities.org/~fishjuggler/MattTattoo.JPG

Firstly though id think _"in 20 years will i even remember who the fuck Ryze is?"_ and if the answer is "_Yes and i love him to pieces!"_ then go ahead haha 

But i think an arm ring of his runes, or maybe a line of runes down the back of the leg or middle of the back. would look cool. 

**SINGLE COLOUR THOUGH! **
black or dark blue. tattoos that use multiple colours often start looking naf (In my opinion of course) 

the designer in me is coming out now...

[EDIT]: His E is even already runes in the shape of a ring, just have that exactly, around your arm or something (my opinion)
